actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A resolution to authorize participation by the United States in parliamentary conferences with Japan.

summary.text: Authorizes the appointment of Members of Congress to meet with representatives of the Japanese Diet for discussion of common problems in the interests of relations between the United States and Japan. Specifies that the meetings shall be when Congress is not in session unless the meetings are held in the United States. Stipulates that no funds shall be authorized to be appropriated under this resolution until fiscal year 1980. Requires reports to Congress by the group for each fiscal year for which an appropriation is made.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize participation by the United States in parliamentary conferences with Japan.
